hgeGUI::MoveCtrl

Moves a control. 

void MoveCtrl(
  int id,
  float x,
  float y
);

Parameters

id
The identificator of the control to be moved.
x
The new X-coordinate for the control.
y
The new Y-coordinate for the control.

Requirements

Header: hgegui.h
Import library: hgehelp.lib

See also

ShowCtrl, EnableCtrl
